content.body:
Thank you to the 25 people who have replied to the [Interest Survey for March 2026 Plenary meeting in New York.](https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/571)

Please take 20 seconds to fill it out if you have not already done so.  I will consider it a Christmas present.
